item.title: Bangabhaban programmer held over alleged hack of Jamaat chief's X account
item.description: Police have confirmed the detention of Sarowar Alam, an assistant programmer at Bangabhaban, following allegations that he 'hacked' the X account of Jamaat-e-Islami chief Shafiqur Rahman. On Tuesday night, a senior Dhaka Metropolitan Police official said that Sarowar was apprehended at Motijheel.
